channel.title: Szymon Pulut's blog feed
channel.description: Szymon Pulut's personal blog feed featuring latest news on technology, careers, fun stories about cars & motorcycles, as well as random trivia

item.title: Hello World! Welcome to my new site!
item.description: Hey, it's Szymon! After gaining experience in developing large-scale observability SaaS at Sumo Logic, I made the exciting leap to working on fascinating projects at Microsoft. But guess what? I've dusted off my old blog to chat & share stories. Let's catch up, shall we?
